thread.title: Al-Shabaab attack on Somali military base kills 10
thread.title_full: Al-Shabaab attack on Somali military base kills 10 | News24

author: news24.com
title: Al-Shabaab attack on Somali military base kills 10
text:
Mogadishu (dpa) - At least 10 people were killed Friday when al-Shabaab fighters attacked a Somali military base, a military commander in the region said.
Six militants and four Somali soldiers were killed in the attack in the Lower Shabelle region early on Friday morning, Abdikafi Hilowle told dpa.
"Tensions are still running high in the area as al-Shabaab fighters arrived in a large number, capturing many parts of that town this morning," Hilowle said.
"Somali troops are still struggling to hold barracks and fight back," he said.
